reviewText: Very happy with purchase.  All 5 DVD's worked fine and delivery was a month quicker than originally advised!

I'm a big Scooby-Doo fan and this collection of 5 movies contains:

Scooby-Doo in Where's My Mummy?
Scooby-Doo and the Monster of Mexico
Scooby-Doo and the Loch Ness Monster
Scooby-Doo and the Legend of the Vampire
Scooby-Doo on Zombie Island

This collection does not focus on guest stars/celebreties or mysteries.  The focus is on Monsters, monsters and monsters.  From Zombies to Vampires to Mummies, this is the one collection of Scooby movies that all kids and parents will enjoy.
